title: We Debut A New Studio With Dos Hombres Cabinet Cigars
itunes:title: We Debut A New Studio With Dos Hombres Cabinet Cigars
description:
It’s finally here. You’ve heard us talk about it for weeks now and the new studio has arrived at the United Podcast Network. This week we will be broadcasting live from the La Flor Dominicana set of the The Cigar Authority where we will light up two cigars from the care package.

Thomas Marshall once said, “what this country needs is a really-good 5-cent cigar.” Well we have the 21st Century equivalent in the Dos Hombre Dominican Cabinet and the Dos Hombre Honduran Cabinet and we will tell you the story of how these cigars carry the same price regardless of your states taxes.

We will also take a look at the struggles of the Brick & Mortar retailer and call on you the listener to help change the trend that retail stores are facing across the country.

Join us for all the madness known as The Cigar Authority with cigar news, a trip into the Asylum and Debonaire Mr. Jonathan.

Join live from Two Guys Smoke Shop in Salem, NH and as always you can find many of the cigars we discuss athttp://www.2GuysCigars.com/
